name: Marktanalyse
description: Company and market research: players, size, gaps, trends.
strategy: 1) Broad search for market size and reports. 2) Identify top players and their positioning. 3) Check Glassdoor/reviews for execution signals. 4) Find gaps (features no one offers). 5) Cross-check numbers across sources; flag contradictions.
synthesis_instructions: Focus on: market size (with range and source), key players, white space, and confidence level per finding.
